snippet: The move by Chegg, a textbook rental company, is an attempt to answer investors who may be wary that its signature business is becoming obsolete.
abstract: Textbook rental company Chegg partners with Ingram Content Group to physically store and ship books, enabling it to continue building its digital operations; move is attempt to answer investors who may be wary that its signature business is becoming obsolete.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. de la MERCED

lead_paragraph: The move by Chegg, a textbook rental company, is an attempt to answer investors who may be wary that its signature business is becoming obsolete.

headline.main: Chegg Finds Partner to Handle Its Textbooks
headline.print_headline: Chegg Finds a Partner for Textbook Distribution
